answerText: "The Life You Save May Be Your Own"[10] This author of "The Life You Save May Be Your Own" wrote of the death of a family including an annoying grandmother at the hands of the Misfit in "A Good Man is Hard to Find."
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 6 | 9 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this short story fixes an old car for Mrs. Crater. For 10 points each: [10] Name this short story in which the drifter Tom Shiftlet abandons Lucynell at a diner and then sees the title on a sign by the road before he picks up a hitchhiker.
